## Image 图片

```tsx
/**
 * title: 基本用法
 * desc: 单击图像可以放大显示。
 */
import React from 'react';
import { Image } from 'kenshin';

export default () => <Image src='https://gimg2.baidu.com/image_search/src=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.hookbase.com%2Fimg2018%2F3%2F1%2F15%2F2018030189398731.jpg&refer=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.hookbase.com&app=2002&size=f9999,10000&q=a80&n=0&g=0n&fmt=jpeg?sec=1623377858&t=fd83498c5ae0af6a7fc5dc3060473e49' />
```

```tsx
/**
 * title: 容错处理
 * desc: 加载失败显示图像占位符。
 */
import React from 'react';
import { Image } from 'kenshin';

export default () => <Image
  src="https://error-url"
  width={200}
  fallback="data:image/png;base64,"
/>
```


```tsx
/**
 * title: 多张图片预览
 * desc: 左右切换按钮可以预览多张图片。
 */
import React from 'react';
import { Image } from 'kenshin';

export default () => <Image.PreviewGroup>
  <Image src='https://zos.alipayobjects.com/rmsportal/jkjgkEfvpUPVyRjUImniVslZfWPnJuuZ.png' width={200} />
  <Image src="https://gimg2.baidu.com/image_search/src=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.hookbase.com%2Fimg2018%2F3%2F1%2F15%2F2018030189398731.jpg&refer=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.hookbase.com&app=2002&size=f9999,10000&q=a80&n=0&g=0n&fmt=jpeg?sec=1623377858&t=fd83498c5ae0af6a7fc5dc3060473e49" width={200} />
</Image.PreviewGroup>
```

```tsx
/**
 * title: 自定义预览图片
 * desc: 可以设置不同的预览图片
 */
import React from 'react';
import { Image } from 'kenshin';

export default () => <Image
  src='https://gimg2.baidu.com/image_search/src=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.hookbase.com%2Fimg2018%2F3%2F1%2F15%2F2018030189398731.jpg&refer=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.hookbase.com&app=2002&size=f9999,10000&q=a80&n=0&g=0n&fmt=jpeg?sec=1623377858&t=fd83498c5ae0af6a7fc5dc3060473e49'
  width={200}
  preview={{ src: 'https://zos.alipayobjects.com/rmsportal/jkjgkEfvpUPVyRjUImniVslZfWPnJuuZ.png' }}
/>
```


## API

| Name | Description | Type | Default |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| alt | 图像描述 | `string` | `-` |
| fallback | 加载失败容错地址 | `string` | `-` |
| height | 图像高度 | `string \| number` | `-` |
| placeholder | 加载占位, 为 `true` 时使用默认占位 | `React.ReactNode` | `-` |
| preview | 预览参数，为 `false` 时禁用 | `boolean \| previewType` | `true` |
| src | 图片地址 | `string` | `-` |
| width | 图像宽度 | `string` \| `number` | `-` |
| onError | 加载错误回调 | `(event: Event) => void` | `-` |

### previewType

| Name | Type |
| --- | --- |
| visible | `boolean` |
| onVisibleChange | `(visible, prevVisible) => void` |
| getContainer | `string \| HTMLElement \| () => HTMLElement` |
| src | `string` |
| mask | `React.ReactNode` |
| maskClassName | `string` |
| current | `number` |

<style>
.kenshin-image {
  margin-right: 10px;
}
</style>
